attributes.action: End the Houses of Parliaments right to exempt itself from the laws IT creates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Freedom of Information Act...
The Smoking in Public Places Ban...
Pay Review Bodies...

These are just three of the laws that the Houses of Parliament have passed, yet they are just three of which they have claimed exemption. Why should the British public have to obey these laws when the Law-makers don't?

For example: What makes Westminster different to a Private Factory? They are both public places, therefore if smoking is banned in the factory it should be banned in Westminster too!

If the politicians, Lords and other hangers-on in Westminster don't obey the laws they create, they make the government, and parliament a Dictatorship NOT a democracy.
